column5: ... for 3 months.  I just called to ask how much it will cost me to get this channel.  You have to order the ultimate sports pack or something like that for $10 a month, but its free for 3 months.  So if anyone has rogers and likes to watch fishing, you have nothing to loose.  Just thought I would let everyone know...
thanks for the heads up.  I check every once in awhile cause it was free for about 6 months last year.  I would subscribe but get tired of the saltwater fishing and european carp tournaments.
